thread.title: New SAE International Presentation Discusses Sustainable Resources to Reduce Emissions for Vehicle Interiors
thread.title_full: New SAE International Presentation Discusses Sustainable Resources to Reduce Emissions for Vehicle Interiors - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: New SAE International Presentation Discusses Sustainable Resources to Reduce Emissions for Vehicle Interiors
text:
SAE International offers a new presentation in which experts in sustainability and engineering will discuss lightweight, renewable solutions with an emphasis on emissions reduction in the cabin and during the manufacturing process.
WARRENDALE, Pa. (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
SAE International offers a new presentation in which experts in sustainability and engineering will discuss lightweight, renewable solutions with an emphasis on emissions reduction in the cabin and during the manufacturing process.
Sponsored by Dow, “ Sustainable Solutions: Reduced Emissions for Vehicle Interiors ,” will be held on Tuesday, October 13 at 10 a.m. U.S. EDT.
Automotive manufacturers are under increased pressure to improve sustainability, fuel efficiency and emissions, and suppliers are in the ideal position to help. Webinar participants will gain insight into regulations forecasts and how to meet current and future requirements. In addition, they will learn about SPECFLEX Activ additive polyols, which have been developed to enable the first truly viable amine emission-free polyurethane foams solution for vehicle interiors. SPECFLEX Activ also helps to meet VOC and odor requirements and contributes to potential weight savings via lower density.
Attendees will be invited to ask questions during the webinar’s Q&A segment.
Speakers for the webinar include:
Dr. Esther Quintanilla, Marketing Manager, Interior/Exterior/Underhood Applications, Dow Automotive Systems Tonja Sutton, Global Strategic Market Manager, Interior/Exterior/Underhood Applications, Dow Automotive Systems
To register for the presentation, “Sustainable Solutions: Reduced Emissions for Vehicle Interiors,” visit https://event.webcasts.com/starthere.jsp?ei=1073576 .
Click here to find the start time at your location.
SAE International is a global association committed to being the ultimate knowledge source for the engineering profession. By uniting over 137,000 engineers and technical experts, we drive knowledge and expertise across a broad spectrum of industries. We act on two priorities: encouraging a lifetime of learning for mobility engineering professionals and setting the standards for industry engineering. We strive for a better world through the work of our philanthropic SAE Foundation, including programs like A World in Motion® and the Collegiate Design Series. http://www.sae.org
